About me

I am currently a second year (2020-2024) Ph.D. student at the AIM lab in the Department of Electrical Engineering of City University of Hong Kong (CityU), supervised by Prof. Yixuan Yuan.


Previously, I got my B.E. in Electronic Science and Technology from the Zhejiang University(ZJU) in 2020. I had great honor to work with Professor Zhaoyang ZHANG, Chunguang LI and Xiaojing GONG.


In this stage, my main focus is medical image analysis. Research interests and experiences range from Image Segmentation, Graph Convolution, Open Set Recognition, Domain Adaptation / Generalization and 3D Point Cloud. I also like to explore Causality, Reinforcement Learning and novel learning schemes.
